metadata.description:
The third set of 10 sonic vignettes from "Old Friends New Cities" is a collage of 8mm film shot by filmmaker Blythe Thomas in and around the house I grew up in, in Long Island New York. 

Living in the blinks between timezones, I’ve documented the last 10 years of my life through 1000+ microsongs – threads of transient nostalgia captured on tape.

Now trading nature immersion for urban hustle, I’m knitting together the last decade via release. 

I hope you'll enjoy,
-dessauer
metadata.name: Arctic Iris / Tundra Flow #1
metadata.title: Arctic Iris / Tundra Flow
